article_title: The Pandemic Has Led to a Huge, Global Drop in Air Pollution
article_description: Reductions in traffic and industry have lowered nitrogen dioxide levels offering an accidental glimpse into what a low carbon future might look like
article_content: This story originally appeared in The Guardian and is part of the Climate Desk collaboration The coronavirus pandemic is shutting down industrial activity and temporarily slashing air pollution levels around the world  satellite imagery from the European Sp   3541 chars
